column4: Im trying to install Enlightenment E17 on 11.11, and apt-get returns that there are unmet dependencies and "E: Unable to correct problems, you have held broken packages."
broken packages... you could try running "sudo apt-get -f install" to fix those - or provide pastebin of what's failing.  Sorry, I've never personally used E17 so can't help there.
have you added some other repo/ppa to your system?
but e17 appears to be in the default repo with 11.10?  why.
did you add some e17 repo to your system?
then "I" can't personally help.  Good luck.
